attributes.action: Scrap free meals for MPs and use the money to provide free tampons in schools.
attributes.additional_details: We have children whose parents can't afford to buy then tampons or panty shields.  Remove the funded meals from parliament and use it to put free dispensers in schools for girls tampons.
attributes.background: Nurses, fireman and other civil servents pay for their own meals on a lot less income than members of parliament.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

There aren't free meals for MPs in Parliament, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
